languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, эти твари... словно впитывают в себя все цвета вокруг, а обратно изрыгают тьму. Не думаю, что они лгут или просто пытаются нас запугать... Они придут. Из теней. Как уже приходили однажды".

"Lord Captain, these creatures... It is as if they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just as they came once before."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, эти твари... словно впитывают в себя все цвета вокруг, а обратно изрыгают тьму. Не думаю, что они лгут или просто пытаются нас запугать... Они придут. Из теней. Как уже приходили однажды".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, these creatures... It is like they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just like they came once before."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ces créatures... C'est comme si elles absorbaient les couleurs qui les entourent pour recracher des ténèbres. Je ne pense pas qu'elles mentent ou qu'elles essayent de nous intimider. Elles jailliront des ombres, exactement comme elles viennent de le faire. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these creatures... It is as if they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just as they came once before."

traits.locale_text: « {Mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ces créatures... C'est comme si elles absorbaient les couleurs qui les entourent pour recracher des ténèbres. Je ne pense pas qu'elles mentent ou qu'elles essayent de nous intimider. Elles jailliront des ombres, exactement comme elles viennent de le faire. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，这些生物……就好像吸收了周围的颜色，喷出了黑暗一样。我觉得他们应该没有撒谎，也没有打算恐吓我们。他们还会从阴影中出现，正如之前那样。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these creatures... It is as if they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just as they came once before."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这些生物……就好像吸收了周围的颜色，喷出了黑暗一样。我觉得他们应该没有撒谎，也没有打算恐吓我们。他们还会从阴影中出现，正如之前那样。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この生き物は…周囲の色を吸収し、闇を吐き出しているようです。彼らが嘘をついているとは思いませんし、あたくしたちを威嚇しようとしているとも思えません。前もそうであったように、彼らは影から現れるのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these creatures... It is as if they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just as they came once before."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この生き物は…周囲の色を吸収し、闇を吐き出しているようです。彼らが嘘をついているとは思いませんし、あたくしたちを威嚇しようとしているとも思えません。前もそうであったように、彼らは影から現れるのでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, diese Kreaturen ... Als würden sie die Farben um sich herum absorbieren und reine Dunkelheit ausspucken. Ich denke nicht, dass sie lügen oder nur versuchen uns einzuschüchtern. Sie werden wieder aus den Schatten kommen, wie schon zuvor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these creatures... It is as if they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just as they came once before."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, diese Kreaturen ... Als würden sie die Farben um sich herum absorbieren und reine Dunkelheit ausspucken. Ich denke nicht, dass sie lügen oder nur versuchen uns einzuschüchtern. Sie werden wieder aus den Schatten kommen, wie schon zuvor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, estas criaturas... Es como si absorbieran los colores de su alrededor y escupieran tinieblas. No creo que estén mintiendo ni tratando de intimidarnos. Surgirán de las sombras, igual que hicieron antes».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these creatures... It is as if they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just as they came once before."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, estas criaturas... Es como si absorbieran los colores de su alrededor y escupieran tinieblas. No creo que estén mintiendo ni tratando de intimidarnos. Surgirán de las sombras, igual que hicieron antes».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bu yaratıklar sanki çevrelerindeki renkleri emiyor ve karanlık kusuyorlar. Yalan söylediklerini ya da gözümüzü korkutmaya çalıştıklarını sanmıyorum. Daha önce nasıl geldilerse yine o şekilde gölgelerden peyda olacaklar."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, these creatures... It is as if they absorb the colours around them and spew out darkness. I do not think they are lying or trying to intimidate us. They will come from the shadows, just as they came once before."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, bu yaratıklar sanki çevrelerindeki renkleri emiyor ve karanlık kusuyorlar. Yalan söylediklerini ya da gözümüzü korkutmaya çalıştıklarını sanmıyorum. Daha önce nasıl geldilerse, yine o şekilde gölgelerden gelecekler."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
